long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Links

Description:

Quick Links is a convenient Chrome extension designed to help you easily add, manage, and access your favorite websites with just one click. Whether it's a frequently visited webpage, a useful online tool, or a must-read article, Quick Links makes it effortless to keep them all within reach.

Features:

Add Links Easily: Quickly add any URL to your list. Just type the website name (e.g., "google.com"), and Quick Links will automatically format it for you.
One-Click Access: All added links are displayed in a clean, simple list. Just click on a link to open it in a new tab.
Persistent Storage: Your links are saved securely, ensuring they are available even after you close your browser.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for a seamless user experience.
Automatic URL Formatting: No need to type "https://". Quick Links automatically adds it for you.
How to Use:

Click the Quick Links extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Enter the URL of the website you want to save in the input field.
Click the "Add Link" button to save the link.
Click on any saved link in the list to open it in a new tab.
Quick Links is your personal URL manager, making it easier than ever to access your favorite sites. Download now and streamline your browsing experience!
